Class SessionCookieStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.commercetools.sunrise.common.sessions.SessionCookieStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SessionStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CacheableObjectStoringSessionCookieStrategy, SerializableObjectStoringSessionCookieStrategy

    public class SessionCookieStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements SessionStrategy
    Uses a session cookie to store information about the user.
